name: The Development on Communication, Arts & Culture, Science,Economic & Education Centre
briefDescription: Our   Organisation has been working different fields like Social Development, Health & Hospital Projects for BPL, Education & School for Below Poverty Line Students, Self Help Groups for Poor Women Groups, Vocational Training Courses ( For Skill Development For Youths & Young Generation ), Training for Youths & Students, Empowerment of Women Groups, Helping to Old Aged Persons ,Elimination of Poverty & Helping the children, Income Generating Activities, Agriculture, Horticulture & Other Social Developmental Activities   of the Nation since its inception (1988 â€“ 89) without any discrimination of Sex, Cast, Race & Religion etc. and our Organization had been working since last 26 years with a  spirit of Voluntarism .
